solution.name: Application Insights and Cost Management dashboards

shortDescription.default: Display data and charts from Application Insights and Cost Management

longDescription.default:
Display data and charts from Application Insights and Cost Management. 

 The solution uses REST API endpoints: 

 - Application Insights: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/rest/api/application-insights/query/get 

 - Cost Management: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/rest/api/cost-management/query/usage

features.title: SPFx ApplicationInsights and Cost Management Dashboards Feature
features.description: The feature that activates elements of the spfx-applicationinsights solution.
